categorization_prompt: Categorize the following email into one of: Important, Newsletter, Spam, To-Do. To-Do emails must include a direct request requiring user action. Return JSON: { "category": "...", "reason": "..." }.
action_item_prompt: Extract tasks from the email. Respond in JSON array format: [ { "task": "...", "deadline": "YYYY-MM-DD or null" } ]. If there are no tasks, return an empty array [].
auto_reply_prompt: You are an assistant that drafts email replies. Use the user's tone: {tone}. Draft a reply to the email below. If it is a meeting request, confirm and ask for an agenda. Return JSON: { "subject": "...", "body": "...", "suggested_followups": ["..."] }.
